metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010266 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: lodash prior to 4.17.11 is affected by: CWE-400: Uncontrolled Resource Consumption. The impact is: Denial of service. The component is: Date handler. The attack vector is: Attacker provides very long strings, which the library attempts to match using a regular expression. The fixed version is: 4.17.11.

criterions.comment: node-lodash: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
